properties.description: Conduct a comprehensive empirical investigation comparing the performance of SHAP-value-based feature selection and importance-based feature selection in the context of fraud detection.
Enhance the performance of fraud detection models using feature selection techniques.
Evaluate and compare the effectiveness of SHAP values and model's built-in feature importance list for feature selection.
The study is limited to analyzing the Kaggle Credit Card Fraud Detection Dataset, focusing on feature selection methods using five different classification models.
